attributes.action: PETITION TO LEAVE THE EUROPEAN UNION TOTALLY -
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I AND OTHERS BELIEVE THAT THE EU IS STRIPPING BRITAIN OF OUR RIGHT TO RULE OUR OWN COUNTRY...HUNDREDS OF LAWS ARE PASSED TO OUR COUNTRY FROM THE EU WHICH WE DONT GET A SAY IN!!!! WE CAN RULE OUR OWN COUNTRY...ALSO WE LOOSE £30 BILLION POUNDS A YEAR TO THE EU...MONEY THAT CAN BE SPENT ON EDUCATING OUR CHILDREN AND IMPROVING OUR HOSPITALS... THE EU IS A WASTE OF TIME....WE CAN RULE OUR OWN COUNTRY!!!!I WANT BRITAIN TO HAVE TOTAL POWER OF WHAT HAPPENS IN BRITAIN, NOT THE BUREAUOCRATS FROM BRUSSELS WHO DONT KNOW WHAT THE BRITISH PEOPLE WANT!
